subject: Career
title: The Follow-Up: Where Relationships Begin
description: Learn The Follow-Up: Where Relationships Begin in one minute.

hook.text: You had a great conversation at a conference. You didn't follow up. Three months later, they've forgotten you.

buildup.text: The relationship doesn't start when you meet. It starts when you follow up.

discovery.text: The 48-hour rule: follow up within two days while memory is fresh. Reference something specific you discussed.

twist.text: Most people don't follow up. The ones who do stand out â€” not because they're better, but because they bothered.

climax.text: A simple message: 'Great meeting you. I loved your point about X. Let's stay in touch.' â€” done.

punchline.text: The meeting opens the door. The follow-up walks through it.

quiz.question: Why is the 48-hour follow-up rule important?
options: Memory is fresh and it shows you're serious about the connection
